title: Classic Poetry for Your Little Genius: Read aloud poems and activities to enhance early learning
description: Classic Poetry for Your Little Genius is a unique interactive poetry anthology which pairs classic poems from over two dozen famous poets with enrichment activities in the areas of visual perception, mathematical reasoning, natural science, and language development. The activities turn the passive act of listening into an engaging experience that allows children to use different areas of their brains. With high-contrast images that even newborns can see, and activities to develop both verbal and non-verbal cognitive skills, this read-aloud poetry and activity book can be enjoyed by children from birth to early elementary and beyond. Introduce your child to influential poets including Emily Dickinson, Robert Frost, William Blake, Alfred Lord Tennyson, Henry Wadsworth Longfellow, Edna St. Vincent Millay, William Butler Yeats, Robert Louis Stevenson, Christina Rossetti, William Wordsworth, William Shakespeare, and more.
author: Lilac Mohr
